name: On the Run (Samuari Corp.)
description: A cyborg awakes from his slumber with a memory from his distant past. One of his samurai days, he notices his katana on a nearby table but is otherwise unfamiliar with his surroundings. He makes his way toward a door, when he steps through it he is standing in a large open field. An alarm starts blaring  though the door behind him so he takes off running. He is faced with the difficult challenge of recovering his memory from the wretched squid who stole it.
